name: Chained to the Beat
description:
Control chained together orbs and try to catch all flying notes in this high-octane arcade game.

What highscore will you reach?

Rules available in game (help). You can press Q or Esc to quit to menu from the level.

Submission to GMTK Game Jam 2021 theme "Joined Together"

Made in 2 days by a solo dev.

-----dev-notes-----

Sadly I didn't have time to add volume sliders for music and sfx :c I'll add them post jam.
